name: Stabilized
description:
Items are falling out of the sky! What the heck!

Help Mable the Rocking Horse catch the items and put them into the barn. The more items you return, the higher your score! But watch out! It’s easy to drop them!

Controls Keyboard

WASD/Arrow Keys — Move

Space — Start

Controller

Left Stick — Move

A Button — Start

Credits

Coby West — Art & Programming

Chris Lucca — Music

Justin R. — Programming

Dylan Ilvento — Programming
